location: Teega Suites - Puteri Harbour, Iskandar Puteri

showroom.address: UEM Sunrise Property Showcase Lot 1, No.1 Jalan Laksamana 1 Puteri Harbour 79250 Iskandar Puteri Johor Darul Ta'zim
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.00am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: Arrive at your serene-inspired luxury address Teega Puteri Harbour boasts a modern contemporary and a holiday-resort like environment with a breath-taking home-coming experience where you can enjoy premium views of the private and public marinas as well as the adjacent linear park. It encompasses four components with the majority being condominium units known as Teega Residence, Teega Suites, office units in Teega Tower and retail outlets at Teega Walk standing tall in three 35-storey towers with 3-storey cabana units.
